name: Cookie Cracker (KRB3AST, Arkiteuthis)
description:
Kareb the baker was trying to enjoy his day off, but that hope was quickly dashed when a bunch of evil cookies descended on his bakery! Not to be deterred, Kareb grabs his trusty Peeler Launcher and stands his ground.   

In this 2D wave-based shooter use the arrow keys to move left and right and the spacebar to fire lemons from the Peeler Launcher. Defend your bakery!

Designer, 2D Artist, UI Programmer: Kyle Remy

Lead Programmer: Marcus Ford

Music Producer, Programmer: Colby Breitenbach ( https://arkiteuthis.itch.io/ )
